homepage.description: Click on any Smart City to visualize its details. Search option is also available. Click on the help button for any doubts or confusion.

about_page.description: Smart City Dashboard is a Flutter app to visualize many available public data of various smart cities through various visually appealing dashboards and charts. This project was created as a part of Google Summer of Code 23 under Liquid Galaxy. Developed thanks to the TIC Laboratories of the Scientific Part of Lleida, Liquid Galaxy EU, Liquid Galaxy LAB, Google Developer Groups Lleida, Women Techmakers Lleida and Parc Agrobiotech Lleida. The app can show realtime weather along with hourly data, various analytic data of the cities and other important data like environment, population etc. The app supports an integrated Google Map to control the Liquid Galaxy. It automatically travels to the location of the city selected and also facilitates the tour of the city's major locations. It can also visualize various KML data in the bigger screen of Liquid Galaxy for better analysis. One of the major feature of the app is that even though the size of the app is small, it can show data of many GBs as it downloads it in realtime and also features to clean those data so that the device does not get clogged of unnecessary large data. The app supports 2 themes and many languages as well.
